abstract: If Amazon allowed third-party developers to make applications for the Kindle, it could turn a device with a single purpose into something much more flexible.
snippet: If Amazon allowed third-party developers to make applications for the Kindle, it could turn a device with a single purpose into something much more flexible.
lead_paragraph: We’re heading into the holiday buying season, which means the introduction of new gadgets and the media’s annual anointment of the season’s hottest tech toy. Plenty of pundits think electronic book readers will sell briskly this year, which got us thinking: Will Amazon update its Kindle e-book reader in time for the holidays?

headline.main: Will Amazon Open the Kindle to Developers?
